price: Behind them is Hell; neither their gains nor those whom they took besides Allah as protectors will avail them anything, and for them there will be a great punishment.
arabic: مِّن وَرَآئِهِمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَلَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُم مَّا كَسَبُواْ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا مَا ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡلِيَآءَۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: min warāihim jahannamu walā yugh'nī ʿanhum mā kasabū shayan walā mā ittakhadhū min dūni al-lahi awliyāa walahum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
